meta.description: The Emirates Business Class Lounge at Dubai International Airport (DXB), Terminal 3, Concourse A. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

location.terminalDirections: 5th Floor, between Gates A1 and A24

reviews.content: Great lounge. One of my favourite world-wide.
Really one of my favorite lounges. Good, clean showers, fast WiFi, OK coffee and lots of room to work or relax.
Definitely one of the best lounges at Dubai. Huge lounge with a lot of seating areas. You almost get lost here. Nice food and drinks offerings, although it varies depending on the time of day.
Excellent hospitality, fantastic selection of drinks and snacks, although there could be more hot dishes for vegetarians. Showers were generally clean and powerful. Gets boring after 2ish hours tho.
The area is pretty much the length of the A concourse. As such, it’s never too crowded like B concourse. No champagne bar, but plenty of space to escape others. Great F&B as well as staff.
First of all you can pay US$107 to get in. Secondly, I’m not an amateur traveler, and usually never drink, but if you don’t hit up the Moet and gourmet dates, you are a moron.
Surprisingly nice lounge, actually quite like the expansive nature of it - there are still enough cosy corners to settle in. Good food and newspapers, staff fairly friendly.
This lounge is filled with various seating areas and sleeping areas for the longer layovers. There is a Moët Chandon champagne bar in this lounge which is a great way to kill time!!
One of the great lounges. From Sydney to London, the shower room is great...freshly cooked food and any drinks you can imagine. Hard to get a seat sometimes...but definitely a great space.
Clean, spacious. Entire 2nd floor. Wifi is great and food is good. Comfortable. Minor thing - wish the shower area had mirrors.
A great lounge. Very big. 2 floors. Many computers for use. Resting area massage and more. And good food.
Spectacular. Wifi excellent. Direct access to second level A380 business flights from lounge. Diverse food and snacks. Bartender for drinks. Very few lounges are better.
Great lounge to relax, read or get some work done. Especially great is that you can board your flight directly from the lounge!
Great Lounge. Used this passing through en route to Singapore. Just time for a quick shower, catch up on some emails and quick bite to eat. This sets the bar regarding standards of Lounge access!
Love the food here, especially their rice. I leave everything to have their breakfast. Comfortable and friendly.
Smoking room w/ cigars is a nice option, food and space are great.
Excellent. Sets the bar for airport lounges. Good service and food. Lots of places to relax, charge your phone or sleep.

Never been happier to have a delayed flight, as it afforded me more time to hang out in this lounge. Well, not so much lounge so much as alternate reality terminal reserved only for the super-fabulous.
Great lounge. Has become too crowded these days
Outstanding, everything you'd expect from Emirates. Lots of space, quiet zones, excellent food. Great way to while away time between flights.

location.terminalDirections: Arrivals Area.

otherLounges.name: Their Patio by Plaza Premium Group

location.terminalDirections: Located in the arrivals area after exiting baggage claim.
Take the lift located next to the souvenir shop to Level 6. Located prior to Gates A1-A12.
After Security Checkpoint and Passport Control, take the elevators located between Gates A1 and A24 to the Hotel Reception on Level 6.
Level 4, between Gates A1 and A24.
Level 5, between Gates A2 and A3. Entrance is via dedicated elevator from the perfume area of the Duty Free Area.
Located in the West Wing of Concourse A, between Gates A2 and A3. Take the lift from the Duty Free Area to the entrance on Level 4.
Opposite Gate A1 in the Duty Free Area.
After Security Checkpoint and Passport Control, take the elevators located near Gates B14 or B22 to the Hotel Reception.
4th Floor, between Gates B16 and B18, near the Information Desk.

otherLounges.name: Lounge @ B (Closed for Renovation, Temp Lounge at Gate B22)

location.terminalDirections: Next to Gate B26, above McDonald's on the 2nd Floor, accessible via escalator, entrance is located inside the Cadiz Tapas Bar.
Level 4, near Gate B21, entrance is right after XpresSpa.

otherLounges.name: Sleep n' Fly Sleep Lounge, Business Pods and Showers

location.terminalDirections: Located between Gates B14 and B18, close to the Emirates Connections Desk.
5th Floor, between Gates B16 and B18.
Located next to Gate C13.
After Security Checkpoint and Passport Control, take the escalators or elevators located between Gates C15 and C17 to the Hotel Reception.
East End of Concourse C, between Gates C21 and C23.

C-Gates, Central Lower Level Duty Free Area. Lounge check-in is via the separate main reception at departure gate level next to Gate C14. The sleep 'n fly lounge is located one level down in the Duty Free Area.
Near Gate C8.
Near Gate C28.
